titleStmt.title: An excellent new song, call'd, The praise of women. Or, Wine, women and musick. Being a playhouse song to a pleasant new tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by Tho. Moore,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "How lovely's a woman before she's enjoy'd, when the spirits are strong, & the fancy not cloy'd ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
